title: High noon yasou / Night hunter rengar

replies.body: Night Hunter baby, That skin looks nice
I'm being a bit biased, but I would also say Rengar. Only because I've played probably 20 times more Rengar than Yasuo, but it's whoever you prefer playing really.
I own both and although the Rengar skin has a really cool toggleable hood, the Yasuo one is hands down awesome and he's really strong at the moment too.
